ValidationRule.description: Both fields are required if one is filled in.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')),$RecordType.Name='Manual Collection', OR( AND(NOT(ISBLANK( CAT_Rejected_Date__c )),ISBLANK(TEXT(CAT_Rejected_Reason__c))), AND(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(CAT_Rejected_Reason__c))),ISBLANK(CAT_Rejected_Date__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CAT Rejected Date and Reason must be filled out together.
